body.name: Clek Olli Backless Booster Car Seat with Rigid Latch, Thunder
body.stockDetail: Only 7 left in stock - order soon.
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery February 21 - 23. Order within 10 hrs 17 mins.
features: Rigid Latch for Additional Safety: Designed with a rigid Latch system that locks the booster seat into place using your vehicles LATCH anchorage system providing additional stability in a collision.

No Numb-bum: Numb-bum is what happens when you sit on hard surfaces for long periods of time — even your legs fall asleep! The Olli is built with an extra layer of padding to feel like the seat in your car.
Accessories Included: Strap-thingy carrying strap for a no-hands carrying convenience, and Drink-thingy cup holder that is removable and dishwasher-safe.

Hassle-free Cleaning: The seating surface is tailored in GREENGUARD Select Certified Crypton Super Fabrics, which provide protection against stains, moisture and odor-causing bacteria. Easy removable covers for cleaning
body.description: As a parent, you’ll appreciate that the Olli belt-positioning backless booster has earned industry awards. With its integrated rigid-LATCH system, the Clek Olli securely fastens to your vehicle’s lower anchors providing additional stability in a collision and a consistent belt fit every time. But, we have an even tougher audience to please: 6 to 12-year-olds who won’t settle for ugly or uncool. With a carrying strap and a quick-release system, Olli gives kids the freedom to carry their own ride wherever they go – from your car to a taxi or even a plane.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Usage Guidelines: Backless Mode: 40-57 in, 40-120 lbs, 4+ years Included in the box: Olli, Manual, Drink-thingy, and Strap-thingy Accessories available for purchase separately Weelee travel bag, Cleaning Kit, Mat-thingy. Clek Olli Backless Booster The Big-Kid Portable Seat Clek Olli is a popular backless booster seat with LATCH. With its integrated rigid-LATCH system, the Olli securely fastens to your vehicle’s lower anchors providing additional stability in a collision and a consistent belt fit every time. It says to the 6-12 year-old that it’s still cool to be safe in the car. The Olli backless booster car seat is easily transportable from vehicle to vehicle and especially handy while traveling from airport to rental car or even the taxi with the convenience of strap-thingy. The drink-thingy detachable cup holder will come in handy on those long rides.

Rigid-LATCH Connectors Attach securely to your vehicle's lower anchors in seconds, providing additional booster seat stability in a collision. No Numb-Bum Comfort Cube Numb-bum is what happens when you sit on hard surfaces for long periods of time — even your legs fall asleep. The Olli is different: it’s built like the seat in your car. Our Comfort-cube construction includes an additional layer of padding that protects against numb-bum. Quick Release System The quick release strap makes uninstalling the seat just as quick as installing.

A Parking Spot For Drinks Long rides call for refreshing drinks to keep the back seat content. The included Drink-thingy cup holder is the perfect vessel to make sure that sip is always within arms reach. No Hands Carrying Convenience Wherever your adventures take you, the Olli is always up for the ride. The included Strap-thingy provides no-hands carrying convenience, just slip it over your shoulder while moving from point A-to-B and beyond. Protection Against Stains Crypton Super Fabrics are Greenguard Select Certified and provide permanent protection against stains, moisture and odor-causing bacteria; and are free of brominated and chlorinated flame retardants (Excludes Drift and Leather models).

Clek is a Canadian based manufacturer of child passenger safety seats that combine safety with ease-of-use and modern style. Born out of one of the world’s largest, most diversified automotive supplier, Clek offers the superior design, engineering best practices, world-class manufacturing, and craftsmanship found in luxury automotive seating today. Additional Information Made in North America 9-year expiration 1-year manufacturer warranty Recyclable through Clek's Car Seat Recycling Program Conforms to all applicable Federal Motor Vehicle Safety Standards Product Dimensions: 13.25 x 12.75 x 5 in, 5 lbs Package Dimensions: 18 x 16 x 11 in, 7 lbs

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 2, 2015
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars The Cadillac of booster seats, except it's much better than a Cadillac
reviews.reviewText: Why would you pay 3-4 times as much for this car seat as for other booster seats, you ask? Funny, I asked myself the same thing. I scoured the reviews, ordered three other highly rated seats, and tried them out for myself.Graco Affix Graco Affix Backless Youth Booster Car Seat with Latch System, Kalia : Felt flimsy, like other Graco products I've come across, non-existent padding. My butt was numb in less than 5 minutes.Evenflo Amp Evenflo Amp Performance No Back Booster Car Seat, Red : Non-existent padding. Same numb-butt problem.Clek Ozzi Clek Ozzi Backless Booster Seat, Licorice : This one was actually okay - well-made and with a tasteful design that doesn't scream in primary colors. If it's not next to any other car seat, it's probably fine. Unfortunately, getting it in and out was ridiculously difficult when it had to be squeezed in next to two other car seats.So I went back to the Clek Olli, which I'd initially dismissed as outrageously expensive for a booster, and rationalized that if you amortize the cost over the number of years the booster will be used, it's actually not so bad. And this car seat - oh man, it's beautiful. The upholstery is high-quality, it's a breeze to install and to take out, and is much, much more plush than booster by other brands. I'd use it myself, if I didn't think my husband would mock me mercilessly. . .

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 26, 2015
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect, compact booster
reviews.reviewText: Attractive, easy to install, shipped fast, exactly as expected. Seat is very comfy and fits in the access cab portion of my Tacoma. It is exactly what we needed fit back there. Perfect and compact for the pickup. Two things though: The cup-holder is a little weak. If you need something for a adult sized water bottle or the like, you will be disappointed in the cup-holder. Second the armrests are hard black plastic and thereby cold in winter, hot in the sun and not cushy/comfy at all. I will be making little pillows to fit on them so that they are a bit more comfortable.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 26, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars these are just ok
reviews.reviewText: I liked these seats, because they match my interior. However, there is a gap at the back of the seat, which looks annoying. My girls don't seem to mind, so we are going to keep them.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 1, 2016
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Awesome seat. Clek sets the standard for child restraints
reviews.reviewText: Awesome seat. Clek sets the standard for child restraints. I now own 3 Clek seats, all purchased from Amazon, and couldn't ask for more. They are extremely high quality, easy to install, and nicely designed.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 2, 2018
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Uses less space than the ones with a back!
reviews.reviewText: My son loves it. I bought this one after looking at almost every other booster (with and without backs) for my son who’s an above average second grader. The one we previously had used the car seat belt but also had a loop between the legs to make sure kids don’t slip through and my son was complaining that it was a little tight around his hips/thighs. This easily attaches/detached to the anchors which I love. Some users complained about the warning sign on the front and I planned on removing it when I bought it, I even bought the stuff to remove it with. However it’s not bad at all! You can’t really see it when it’s attached. I honestly forgot to remove it and no longer plan on removing it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 28, 2019
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best for BIG kids
reviews.reviewText: This is by far the best booster for big kids! My 8 year old is 90 lbs and he’s very comfortable in this seat.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 20, 2015
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love this seat!
reviews.reviewText: This seat is great, so much mor cushion than other seats and we love that it clicks in, is so easy to remove and has a cup holder for trinkets!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 16, 2016
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Rigid Latch is the way to go!
reviews.reviewText: We looked at many booster before buying this one. I loved the rigid latch, but do feel that it is a bit overpriced, especially if you don't get one with any special designs. It travels well - is light, has a shoulder strap and the latch release is awesome! However, this was not a good seat for long rides in an Acura MDX (the seats are too bucketed, so there wasn't enough back support) as my son complained that his back hurt from sitting in this for too long.
